title: Amazing traditional food
text: Enjoy 3 days of authentic italian mountain food, straight from ancient, simpler times.

title: Speak the same language
text: The event is invite-only and you will spend time with like-minded but diverse and extremely impressive people.

title: Professional ski guides
text: We will be joined by professional, licensed ski guides and professional mountaneers.

title: Wellness
text: A new alpine experience centered on quality of life. We will have an amazing SPA session aimed at restoring your physical and spiritual balance.
